name: Sjunsei Awal | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Sjunsei Awal | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: This game is an obstacle course-based game that requires the player to push their “Ball” up to the end. The main objective is to reach the end, using the force that will build up to get through erratic obstacles that behave in the most annoying of manners.
